---
title: "Installing Python Packages"
---

How you install Python packages depends on whether you are using a **conda environment**. See our page on [conda environments](conda.qmd) to learn how conda can help with **version control** and **reproducibility**. If youâ€™re working within a conda environment, follow the conda installation instructions. Otherwise, you can install packages using **pip**.

## kb-python
### Conda
```bash
conda install -c conda-forge -c bioconda kb-python
```

### pip
```bash
pip install kb-python
```

## seqspec
### Conda
```bash
conda install -c conda-forge -c bioconda seqspec
```

### pip
```bash
pip install kb-python
```
